parameters.name: LpDispatch
parameters.description: Direction reference: If a translated, then a plane , planar face , linear edge , or reference axis If rotated, then a linear edge or reference axis

title: IMoveFaceFeatureData.SetDirectionReference
description: Sets the direction reference for the Move Face feature.

parameters.name: LpDispatch
parameters.description: Direction reference: If a translated, then a plane , planar face , linear edge , or reference axis If rotated, then a linear edge or reference axis

returns: True if the direction reference is set, false if not

examples.title: Change Direction Reference of Move Face Feature (VBA)
